Food was excellent environment excellent great service BUT HOLY COW is this place expensive, they charge a whopping 20% service charge and to add insult to injury an additional 5% ‚Äúadmin fee‚Äù all and all your hit with 25% in fees for just sitting not to mention food is also very expensive. Again excellent place but this threw me off and would def 2nd guess coming on the regular. Without a doubt was deft the most expensive restaurant I have ever been too and I‚Äôve been to all the fancy top of the line restaurants across Brooklyn Miami etc.

I ordered a medium-rare burger but received it well-done, which the waiter acknowledged. Unfortunately, it lacked flavor, and when I mentioned the issue after eating, the staff told me I should have spoken up earlier. The service was unaccommodating, and overall, the food was bland.

I wouldn‚Äôt recommend it.

The food and service were outstanding! Visiting from Florida as a party of three without a reservation, we were warmly welcomed. Oren‚Äôs hospitality was nothing short of exceptional‚Äîhe treated us like long-lost family returning home after a year abroad.
Food was delicious!! Ziggy made some great drinks, we could use a mango flavored daqueri though!! Service was great, Eric and ziggy were awesome.
Have been coming here with my wife every week for the past few months. Best kosher restaurant, highly recommend.
amazing food

The food was out of this world. Amazing atmosphere, vibe and overall experience. Drinks were fire and service was great. Will definitely be coming back

I recently visited Margaz Grill, and I can confidently say it‚Äôs a hidden gem for anyone who loves perfectly spiced meats. From the moment I stepped in, the aroma of sizzling margaz sausages and fresh herbs welcomed me, setting the tone for a fantastic dining experience.

The margaz here is nothing short of extraordinary. Juicy, tender, and packed with a medley of spices, each bite bursts with authentic flavors. The chefs clearly take pride in their craft, serving sausages with a balance of smokiness and spice that‚Äôs hard to find elsewhere.

If you‚Äôre a fan of meat in general, the menu has so much more to offer: perfectly grilled lamb chops, succulent beef skewers, and even flavorful sides like garlic-infused roasted potatoes and fresh salads to complement the main dishes.

The ambiance is warm and inviting, making it perfect for family dinners or casual outings with friends. Service was attentive and friendly, adding to the overall charm of the restaurant.

Whether you‚Äôre a seasoned foodie or just looking for a satisfying, hearty meal, Margaz Grill is a must-visit. I‚Äôll definitely be back for more!
Wowwwwww!!!
The food was good and the service was good.
Great place ever!
Reasonable price, very basic mediterranean menu, the waiter kept coming back and tried to convince us to order more food. not so pleasant.
Abie was so helpful and the server gave me the food on perfect timing and everything was perfect
Food was delicious service was pretty good atmosphere was quite nice

11/10 recommend this place. Make sure to have a reservation as seating is a bit limited however everything else is a plus.
The ambiance is beautiful and the decor is nice.
Malia was our waitress and she was so pleasant! She held entrees for us to give us time to eat the appetizers.
The food was amazing and came out piping hot and fresh.
We had the dirty nachos, chicken poppers, pastrami burger and and brisket burger.
The veggies for the burger were super fresh as well.
The drink menu is unique and delicious.
This place is a gem.

I highly recommend Margez Grill House on Ave M. Their customer service is exceptional. After placing an order, my food arrived half-open and squashed because the Uber driver had opened the bags. I contacted Margez, and they were extremely apologetic and explained how meticulous they are about kashrut, with their mashgiach double-checking the bags before delivery. They immediately suggested that I replace my order, ensuring it was secure. Two different managers called me to confirm the food was taped and sealed properly.

The portions were large and generous, and the food was incredibly tasty. The packaging was excellent, with dry and wet dishes separated to avoid sogginess ‚Äì for instance, the chicken platter had the chicken in one container and the salad in another.

I will definitely reorder and highly recommend everyone give them a try.

Wow! This place has REALLY delicious food!!! Funny thing is, I live a couple of short blocks away, and never even knew this place existed. My brother was here by me visiting from out of town with his girl, we wanted to go out to eat, and he found your place online, that is only walking distance from my place and I never knew about it...
Anyway, I'm glad he found out about it, cause we had a really nice time there. The place was really full, but they seated us almost right away. And took out order quickly, the food started coming out almost immediately. And every thing we tried, was really delicious! Not one dish did we not like. The service was also very nice. We really enjoyed it in every way.
I'll definitely recommend your place, and I'll for sure be back.

I think this was my first experience going to a restaurant and enjoying every single dish.
First off- if you‚Äôre going to a place called Margez, you must order the margez. It was absolutely delicious and my favorite appetizer. The restaurant is relaxing and clean. Service was great, our food came very quickly. We ordered the margez soup which was so spicy but insanely delicious. We also ordered arayes, shishito peppers, the pastrami burger with french fries, and skirt steak with mashed potatoes. Everything was cooked perfectly and had delicious flavor. Don‚Äôt skip dessert, the kunefe and chocolate chip molten cookie were also fantastic and the best way to end our meal.
The vibe is awesome, the food is next level delicious and also very fresh! Service is super good and food is ready very fast! Will definitely recommend and come here again!

Very good food
Fresh
Great customer service
The place has beautiful design.
Everything is very clean
Absolutely recommended!!

Absolutely loved this restaurant! The ambiance was awesome, and the food was fantastic. We ordered 4 appetizers and everything was delicious. Pretty high end I‚Äôd say, it would be a solid place to go to for birthdays, anniversary‚Äôs, or even for just a night out. No question I‚Äôd pop by again soon, 10/10! We paid about $130 for 4 appetizers including tip and a bottle of club soda, for reference.

After being an extremely good customer for a while [being one of their first customers]... I paid a visit recently, and the guy at the door desk [claiming to be the manager, which I never saw him] told me that I can't get a table becuase I didn't have reservations.
Although he had several empty seats available...
It's extremely upsetting üò°, loyal customers shouldn't be treated this way!!

If you want nasty attitude, pay a visit at this place, you'll certainly get it.
Came for my birthday. Prices are reasonable, very big portions, food is nicely arranged, great taste , and the place looks really upscale and hip.

Had an amazing experience here! From the food to the ambiance to the service- everything was üëåüèª
Will definitely be back
Love this place.  Choice is great !  All entrees must try! I definitely come back! Great place to have a meeting of celebrate event with small group of friends or family
Great ambiance, amazing service, and delicious food. Would 10000% recommend.
Very cozy and delicious place!  Service at the best level! I will definitely come back here again!‚ò∫Ô∏è
Food was outstanding! Great vibe and service is amazing!
Great atmosphere and the best nachos I've ever had‚ÄîI highly recommend going
The best!!!! So fresh and clean. And the most important so delicious!!! Highly recommended ‚ù§Ô∏è
As an appetizer, Margaz sausages were juicy and delicious. The main course, the chef steak, is excellent

Came with family here last night. Everyone was very satisfied. Food was amazing. We had multiple appetizers (arayes were excellent!), and then several different type of burgers, and the rice entr√©e (tajene). No complaints. Manager (Oren) was great ("dinner and a show!") and even my picky teenager had no complaints! We got seated promptly even without reservations and the wait staff was very professional and attentive even though they were obviously busy. Thanks for a memorable evening!

Very decent and overall good experience.
Food was very good overall, steak was cooked to perfection.
Service was ok, there were some times that we had to wait a bit long for someone to remove our used plates, the mains were brought out while we still had our dirty plates ..
The tables are also extremely close to each other, which makes it extremely uncomfortable if you'd like to have a nice quiet dinner with someone.
Overall, a very decent place
I really enjoyed this place food was great and tasty

Food was meh at the price we paid. At a lower price point food would be worth it. Atmosphere was nice though if not in the back room you feel like you‚Äôre at a lower end restaurant due to the surrounding area. Probably wouldn‚Äôt go back due to the prices and overall quality of my meal. Young Man in the front who sat is, waited on us, and was the clear leader of the house did a great job.

Great steak. We got the cowboy, tacos and fries and split it  all between us, and it was plenty of food.

All the food was great.

Tacos are spicy,  but it doesn't say that on the menu.

We got a seat next to the speaker, and around every 5 minutes, they blasted "Happy Birthday" in our ears. Just avoid sitting next to that speaker and you'll have a great time.

We came in without a reservation and Jonathon our waiter got us a table even though it was packed! He was attentive, clear, and overall added to the great experience. Food is delicious, atmosphere a vibe, a little pricey (adding grilled chicken to my salad was an additional $18 on top of the $22 salad) but it is NY so whatever. Would recommend to friends and definitely return!
